name: We! Siblings! (A Gacha Visual Novel) [Alpha Release]
name_original: We! Siblings! (A Gacha Visual Novel) [Alpha Release]
description:
"We! Siblings!" tells a tale about two siblings, HerobrineLD and Kereina. Who moved into a new town for a new life. The two promise to stay strong and become happy together. Until different situations tried to broke the apart. Will They'll Keep Their Promise? Or They Leave Each Other Behind.

Thank You For Playing We! Siblings!
This is the first chapter of the novel and we we're still working on the next chapter.

I don't own any designs of the characters and credits to Lumine for the app we use to create the characters.

Please Support Us!!

~HerobrineLD~
YT Channel: https://youtube.com/channel/UCRMlS-qv28PoQZ3-4vG5WVw
